name: Shelmet
description: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
